headline: Deere Leans On AI And Digital Platforms For New Growth Engine
summary: Deere is rolling out AI-powered autonomous tractors and expanding its digital agriculture platforms as it pushes further into precision farming. The company is also moving deeper into construction technology with the acquisition of Tenna, a connected equipment and asset management platform. Together, these moves mark a clear shift for Deere toward technology-driven solutions across farming and construction. For investors watching NYSE:DE, the story is now about much more than traditional...
